fields_of_interest: Competition, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: The key policies of interest are REACH, SEVESO, Industrial Emissions Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: CETS - European Committee for Surface Treatment
goals__remit:
The Surface Engineering Association provides the 'focus' for all aspects of the UK surface engineering industry. Through its structures and committees the SEA brings together the membership, resources, technical and industrial expertise of the MFA (Metal Finishing Association), the BSTSA (British Surface Treatment Suppliers Association), the PPFA (Paint and Powder Finishing Association), the CHTA (Contract Heat Treatment Association) and the Wolfson Heat Treatment Centre (WHTC). 
 
The SEA offers a complete package of activities that include: 
 
•interface with government to improve international competitiveness 
•consultation with health, safety and environmental specialists at national and international levels  
•links with other trade associations  
•links with academic institutions for education, training and new technology
